greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where column k is the expansion of e.g.f. exp(-k*x)/(1 - x)^k.
comment: A(n,k) is the k-fold exponential convolution of A000166 with themselves, evaluated at n.
link: Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
formula: E.g.f. of column k: exp(-k*x)/(1 - x)^k.
mathematica: Table[Function[k, n! SeriesCoefficient[Exp[-k x]/(1 - x)^k, {x, 0, n}]][j - n], {j, 0, 11}, {n, 0, j}] // Flatten
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Nov 16 2017
